author: Cat Bussell
description:
Two upcoming DnD books will allow players and DMs alike to explore the Forgotten Realms, but, in contrast to their predecessors, these supplements look poised to move beyond the setting’s more tried and tested locales.

Continue reading DnD's upcoming Forgotten Realms books promise to take us beyond Baldur's Gate
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: DnD's upcoming Forgotten Realms books promise to take us beyond Baldur's Gate

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
The Big Summer Warhammer Preview featured tons of exciting news, but Leagues of Votann arguably stole the show with a massive update.  With 27 new miniatures coming for the faction, the Warhammer 40,000 galaxy finally has a veritable army of “space salesmen” to contend with. More information about the miniatures can be found in our article on the 10th Edition reveal of the Leagues of Votann.

Continue reading The Leagues of Votann are up next for preorder in today's Warhammer preview!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 4
title: The Leagues of Votann are up next for preorder in today's Warhammer preview!

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Dungeons and Dragons has countless settings, but a proper fantasy Japan has been the dream of many players. Fortunately for them, Wizards of the Coast announced a brand-new campaign inspired by Japanese culture and folklore.  Oni’s Right Hand puts players in Phandalin, a trading town that will soon become the recipient of a mysterious artifact, the Oni’s Claw. As a massive fan of culturally resonant tabletop RPGs, I am very intrigued by this upcoming adventure.

Continue reading DnD meets Fantasy Japan in the upcoming Oni's Right Hand campaign!
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes
title: DnD meets Fantasy Japan in the upcoming Oni's Right Hand campaign!

author: Cat Bussell
description:
An iconic piece of the Marvel universe has been given the Magic: The Gathering treatment in a brand new preview alongside promises of future crossovers.

Continue reading MTG Spider-Man preview confirms "multiple sets" of Marvel crossovers in future
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: MTG Spider-Man preview confirms "multiple sets" of Marvel crossovers in future

author: Cat Bussell
description:
A new Backerkit campaign has launched for the Shiver TTRPG, aiming to bring a brand new expansion to the deeply atmospheric indie horror game.

Continue reading Iconic indie horror TTRPG gets corporate spin-off in new Backerkit campaign
title: Iconic indie horror TTRPG gets corporate spin-off in new Backerkit campaign

author: Mollie Russell
description:
It’s official; Critical Role campaign 4 kicks off on October 2, and Brennan Lee Mulligan will be in the Game Master’s chair. A press release from August 2 confirms Critical Role’s fourth series marks the first time that someone other than veteran Matt Mercer has GMed a campaign. The series will also apparently introduce “a brand-new world” to the Critical Role canon.

Continue reading Critical Role campaign 4 announced, with Brennan Lee Mulligan as DM
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Critical Role campaign 4 announced, with Brennan Lee Mulligan as DM
